alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Morrison; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 11:23AM CST until December 27 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...BLOWING SNOW OVER CENTRAL MINNESOTA CONTINUES... .Strong west winds have developed on the back side of this storm system which will lead to more blowing snow across central Minnesota through mid afternoon. Therefore, the Winter Weather Advisory has been extended for Douglas, Todd and Morrison Counties through 3 PM. Elsewhere, conditions are improving and the advisory will be allowed to expire at noon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing Snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Douglas, Morrison and Todd Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Bowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
